topics.body:
Sorry for interrupting your conversation, but there's something that bothers me, and I need a place to say it.

My life is way too smooth, and I'm feeling bad about it.

I mean, I look at the people around me, both in real life and on the net, and I just have it so easy comparing to them. People have to deal with bad family members, dead relatives, cheating soulmates, illnesses, depression, accidents, or at least, general hardship in daily life, such as job, money, etc. Me, on the other hand, never have worried about those things. I never had any significant problems with my life, and have everything paid for me, until I get out of school and have a job, which won't be for another 3-4 years. Not that I laze around and do nothing, but it still doesn't feel right.
topics.author: 4fded3ad945b700aaa01381d

"@Grieffon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cc50be6368723547170200#post_53cc50be6368723547170200
Ppffffffttthahahahahahahaha!

my life has been smooth as fuck and i fear for the future cause i know, deep inside, ILL NEVER be ready.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@Grieffon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cc50be6368723547170200#post_53cc50be6368723547170200
You are apologizing for your life being too good! Dude, life kicks people in the balls all the time. All you gotta do is take it and kick life right back!
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@Grieffon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cc50be6368723547170200#post_53cc50be6368723547170200

Balance of probability. For every person that has a hard life, someone has it less.

If you feel bad, then take advantage of what you got and exploit it from now so that you can use it better in the future and, if you feel like you should, give back to some of those people.
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cc518a636872040e650000#post_53cc518a636872040e650000
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]
You are *apologizing* for your life being too good![/bq]All right, that's one of the last thing I want to hear about myself. What was I thinking?

Someone punch me for having that line of thinking which I so despise.
topics.author: 4fded3ad945b700aaa01381d

topics.body:
"@Grieffon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cc524c6368725c82d30000#post_53cc524c6368725c82d30000
No I just find it funny and kind of cute in a way. There is no need to apologize for something you can't control.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
i was thinking about how my life is good.

then i remembered how my intelligence is comparable of that of a coconut and my attention is shorter than a 6 month used pencil causing me to be a joke in class and im studying something i might not even like once i grow up.

so the world is balanced again.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@Grieffon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cc50be6368723547170200#post_53cc50be6368723547170200
I feel bad about it too at times. But feel fortunate that you are gifted with a good life. Just don't be selfish in a way that actually hurts others intentionally. As long as you don't do anything wrong, I don't see what's wrong. But do be considerate when required.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cc52ad6368727f45eb0100#post_53cc52ad6368727f45eb0100
I can't stand apologists and there I was being just that.
topics.author: 4fded3ad945b700aaa01381d

topics.body:
"@Grieffon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cc524c6368725c82d30000#post_53cc524c6368725c82d30000
What "@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cc52ad6368727f45eb0100#post_53cc52ad6368727f45eb0100 and "@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cc53e463687247290e0000#post_53cc53e463687247290e0000 said. You don't owe anyone an apology for not living in squalid poverty. I encourage you to support charity and volunteer work, but not as some sort of penance for having the luck to have a decent life. Do it because its a good thing to do.

As in all things the moral maxim of "just don't be an asshole" applies.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@Grieffon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cc50be6368723547170200#post_53cc50be6368723547170200
[bq="Grieffon"]Sorry for interrupting your conversation, but there's something that bothers me, and I need a place to say it.

My life is way too smooth, and I'm feeling bad about it.

I mean, I look at the people around me, both in real life and on the net, and I just have it so easy comparing to them. People have to deal with bad family members, dead relatives, cheating soulmates, illnesses, depression, accidents, or at least, general hardship in daily life, such as job, money, etc. Me, on the other hand, never have worried about those things. I never had any significant problems with my life, and have everything paid for me, until I get out of school and have a job, which won't be for another 3-4 years. Not that I laze around and do nothing, but it still doesn't feel right.[/bq]
Then put your life to good use.

topics.body:
"@Grieffon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cc50be6368723547170200#post_53cc50be6368723547170200
I think I know what you mean. I live a fairly lax life and whenever I get moody, doing some work always makes me feel better. 
See,I don't think humans are designed to function without adversity. That doesn't mean it's bad not to have obstacles in your life but it can get to you, as silly as it sounds.
